<Text: Smiley (alligator):  At the time of her death at the age of 65, she held the record of being the oldest living alligator in captivity, an honor that landed her a spot in the "Guinness Book of World Records".>

Text: Smiley (alligator):  At the time of her death Smiley weighed 75 kg and measured 265 cm , which is small for North American alligators (males can grow to a length and weight double that).
